WT_BOOT_MSG: The Win-Test telegram bot is now active!
WT_SHUTDOWN_MSG: The Win-Test telegram bot is shutting down...
WT_ENCODING_ERROR:
Sorry, I couldn't pass that message to Win-Test üòï

Please only use letters from the extended latin alphabet. (That excludes also emojis)
WT_MSG_LONG_ERROR:
Sorry, I couldn't pass that message to Win-Test üòï

Win-Test message have a maximum length of [charlimit] characters!
WT_STN_LONG_ERROR:
Sorry, I couldn't pass that message to Win-Test üòï

Your Win-Test display name ([stnname]) is too long. The maximum length is [charlimit] characters!
UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error arose. Please contact your Bot-Manager.
REQUEST_WTNAME:
Hi [name]!

It seems you have not set a Win-Test display name. Please to so, that operators can identify the sender. Use the /name command for that.
RESTART_VALID: I am already started and ready to go in this chat! Use /help to show additional info.
RESTART_UNVALID:
I am already started in this chat. However, this chat is not activated. Please respond with /verify [SECRET KEY] to activate this chat. 

You will get the secret key from this bot's manager.
WELCOME_PRIVATE:
Hi [name]!
Nice to meet you! I am a Telegram bot which builds a bridge between Win-Test's chat and telegram. With me, you can receive and send chat messages from and to Win-Test during a contest!

To get started, you'll need to verify yourself. In order to so so, please use /verify [SECRET_KEY]
You will get the secret key from your bot manager.
WELCOME_GROUP:
Hi everyone!
I am a Telegram bot which builds a bridge between Win-Test's chat and telegram. With me, you can receive and send chat messages from and to Win-Test during a contest!

To get started, you'll need to verify this chat. In order to so so, please use /verify [SECRET_KEY]
You will get the secret key from your bot manager.
UNKNOWN_CHAT_ERROR: Oops, it seems I have no data about this conversation. Please start a conversation using /start.
INVALID_VERIFY_SYNTAX:
The correct syntax for this command is:
/verify [SECRET KEY]
Please try again.
VERIFY_SUCCESS_PRIVATE:
Verification successfull!

From now on, new Win-Test chat messages will appear here. In order to send a message to Win-Test, just write a message in this chat. 
For additional commands, see /help

I suggest you set your Win-Test display name. If you set it equal to your callsign you use to OPON into Win-Test, I can identify you as operator and not send your own messages into this chat.
VERIFY_SUCCESS_GROUP:
Verification successfull!

I will relay Win-Test messages into this goup chat. In order to send messages to Win-Test, start your message with @[botuname].

Everyone of you can set a Win-Test display name using /name
This allows the operators to identify the author of the messages. If you plan to operate, set this name to your Win-Test OPON callsign.
VERIFY_FAILED: Sorry that key was not correct. Please try again. Make sure you don't accidentally send spaces in the message.
NOT_VALID_ERROR: Sorry, this chat is not verified. Please do so via the /verify [SECRET_KEY] command.
